articles.title: 6,6,6,6,6! RCB Star Wreaks Havoc In England T20 Blast; Hits 5 Consecutive Sixes In One Over- WATCH - Times Now
articles.description: Will Jacks hit Luke Hollman for five consecutive sixes in the first five balls of the 11th over of the Vitality T20 Blast game between Surrey and Middlesex.
